Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • NPC

  • public class NPC
extends Player
    A child of Player, which has internal logic This allows it to be played without active user control
    Author:
    Zaionz

    • Constructor Detail

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String token,
           int tokenSize)
        A constructor for a NPC (Non Playable Character)
        Parameters:
        name - The NPC's name
        token - The token chosen by the user for the NPC
        tokenSize - The Display generated tokenSize

      • NPC

        public NPC(java.lang.String name,
           int wallet,
           int position,
           int numberOfJailCards,
           boolean inJail,
           int turnsLeftInJail,
           boolean inDebt,
           int debt,
           java.lang.String token,
           int tokenSize)
        Parameters:
        name - The NPC's name
        wallet - The NPC's balance
        position - The NPC's position on the board
        numberOfJailCards - The NPC's number of get out of jail free cards
        inJail - If the NPC is in jail
        turnsLeftInJail - The number of turns the NPC has left in jail (Can be 0)
        inDebt - If the NPC is in debt
        debt - The NPC's debt (Can be 0)
        token - The token chosen by the user for the NPC
        tokenSize - The Display generated tokenSize
